phrases: Open your mind.
Open your mind.
Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
Let us see... slippers, detergent, and...
Oh, I forgot to get clothespins!
Really?
That is great.
Living on your own is more expensive than you would think.
Then why do not you move in with Keiichi?
No way!
I am finally moving to the city.
I am going to enjoy single life to the fullest!
Plus, I do not want to get in the way of you two... huh?
Hey, that is right, it is White Day.
Did you already get something from Kei today?
What?
A return gift for the chocolates.
I bet he gave something neutral like cookies...
Chocolates, did you say?
Wait a minute, you did not know about Valentine's Day last month?
No.
So in other words...
Ah!
Where to Confess One's Love?
What?
You practice such customs here on Earth?
I would not say'on Earth'...
It is more like'in Japan.'
But in a relationship like yours, giving Kei chocolates would be a no-brainer.
Megumi, did you offer a gift to someone as well?
No, because I do not care about that kind of stuff.
But Kei might be taking it a little hard.
Has he been acting strangely at all recently?
Now that you mention it...
Another sunny day today.
Yes.
Another sunny day today.
It is the 2nd week of February.
Spring is right around the corner.
It certainly is.
I was wondering if you know about any of the customs we have here on Earth?
Yes, I am familiar with several of them.
Are you?
What day is it today again?
It is Monday.
If it is Monday, then that means... right...
It must be the 14th.
I see...
Oh, I just remembered!
What?
Oh, I just remembered!
The 14th is the day the Auto Club presents its monthly expense report.
Right, that is right.
Oh boy, he was so waiting for it, was not he!
I do not really have a good grasp on the customs here.
But you guys are living together... you cannot blame him for being depressed.
I am sorry...
Hey, Megumi, I did not know you were here.
We should be heading for school soon.
All right.
I will go get ready now.
Hold on!
Huh?
I need to go somewhere with Belldandy today, so you go on ahead to class.
I will be going, then.
Um... I think I will go and apologize to Keiichi.
Wait!
Do not apologize, it will make things worse.
But...
Do not apologize, it will make things worse.
I have got a better idea.
Just do what I say!
Let this mouth-watering chocolate be suffused with...
I knew you could do it, Belldandy!
No question about it, Kei's going to be thrilled!
Do you really think so?
You really look happy yourself.
Yes, that is my reason for being here... to make Keiichi happy.
I am really glad... that you are the woman in Kei's life.
Now all you have to do is take Kei to a romantic spot and hand it to him.
And tell him,'Sorry I was late!'
And that will fix everything?
You cannot miss!
All right!
Man... it is March already, huh?
Keiichi?
Hey, were not you going out with Megumi today?
Um... actually, I have something for you, see...
Are you out of your mind?
Trying to give me that ugly bouquet in an unromantic place like this?
How insensitive are you?
Unromantic?
Take him to a romantic spot and hand it to him.
Is this what you would call an unromantic place?
Huh?
Well, I guess most people would say that.
Is that right?
Excuse me.
Hey, wait!
Belldandy!
Excuse me.
Hey, wait!
Belldandy!
Really!
These days you can throw a rock and hit 10 clueless guys like him!
Excuse me?
Oh, it is you!
What do you want?
I was wondering if you could tell me where I can find a'romantic spot.'
Romantic...
You see, I have to give Keiichi these chocolates in a romantic place.
Being sarcastic?
What?
I get it now!
You are just gushing over Morisato like that to make me give up on him, right?
Give up on him?
What do you mean?
Are you playing dumb again?
Playing dumb?
Listen, you!
Wait a minute... is this girl just naive?
Um...
Um... so can you tell me about the spot?
A romantic spot, you say?
So you are going to tell me where I can find one?
Sure I will tell you, but in return, I want you to meow like a cat!
Meow!
Stick your head outside and shout'Yahoo!'
Yahoo!
Yahoo!
Yahoo!
No question about it now...
Yahoo!
Yahoo!
Yahoo!
I guess I have no choice.
Come with me.
All right!
So he is going to come here?
Yes.
Oh, here he comes!
That is him.
If anyone knows about romantic spots, it is that guy.
Really?
Thank you very much!
Do you have any idea who that guy is?
The No. 1 Casanova on campus... Toshiyuki Aoshima!
If you approach him...
Excuse me...
Would you please tell me where I can find a'romantic spot'?
I have never seen her before.
Both her body and looks make the grade...
I guess today's my lucky day!
Very well.
Let us go, then.
What?
Wait!
Come back!
That is not fair!
Now that you are in that rogue's clutches he will have his way with you, and once...
I wonder if Belldandy went on home?
She sure was acting kind of weird...
Hmm?
Belldandy?
Belldandy!
Huh?
Dammit!
Why did it have to die on me at a time like this?
I am sorry!
Are you saying that this is a romantic spot?
That is right.
Would Keiichi really be happy if I brought him to a place like this?
Keiichi?
Excuse me, can you think of another place?
Huh?
It is just that I do not think Keiichi would like it if I brought him here.
Who gives a damn about a guy like that?
I brought you here because I wanted to make you happy!
But that will not do... the goal is to make Keiichi happy!
That is my duty.
Duty?
Do you mean that jerk is actually forcing you to...
No, he is not forcing me at all...
That is precisely why I want Keiichi to be happy.
I do not know what your motive was, but the fact is that you came here with me.
What are you doing?
What do you mean?
You know perfectly well!
Why are you running?
You are the one who pretty much said you wanted me.
I never said such a thing!
It is a little late to say no!
I want you to come here!
You have hit a dead end.
I have no choice, then.
Run, O Spirit of Lightning, release yourself from your shackles...
And subject this man to an ordeal!
I do not know what kind of spell...
And subject this man to an ordeal!
I do not know what kind of spell...
W-What the hell is this?
Where did she go?
W-What the hell is going on?
Belldandy!
Belldandy!
Belldandy!
Belldandy!
All right, I am going to change now, so you stay out!
B-But...
Did not you hear a word I said?
That guy duped her into going with him, that is all.
She is from another country.
She does not know how things are done in Japan.
If that is the case, I guess it is all right.
See ya!
You went along with him to find a romantic spot, is that it?
Yes.
I am so sorry.
What am I going to do with you?
Um... could you tell me?
Where a romantic spot might be?
Sure, I could do that, but...
I want to make Keiichi happy, no matter what.
Kei, you are such a lucky dog.
Ugh...
Senior, I cannot do it anymore...
Good morning!
Whoa!
Belldandy!
Um...
I wanted to ask you if you had any plans for today?
Huh?
No, I am not doing anything.
Um, there is someplace I would like to go.
I was wondering if you would accompany me...
Well, sure...
Then please come to the living room after you have gotten dressed.
Now all you have to do is take him to places he likes.
All right.
But the thing is, I am not really sure what kind of place he would like.
Do not worry!
As long as you go with him, he will have a ball no matter where you take him!
You can have these.
What are they?
I won them in the prize-drawing at a party.
If you take him there, I guarantee he will have himself a blast.
One more thing, you two have to be alone together, always.
Three's a crowd.
But why is that?
I always thought the more the merrier...
Because then it will not be fun for him anymore!
Are you sure that is how he would feel?
Hey, trust me!
That is how any guy would feel!
Okay then, good luck!
Someplace she would like to go?
I wonder what is up with her, all of a sudden...
We have not had much time to be alone lately, so I guess it is good timing.
This is where you wanted to go?
Yes!
I thought you would have a good time if we came here.
You did?
Well, thanks.
I wanted to go, but I did not have the money so I would given up on the idea.
Um, are you having a good time?
Of course I am!
Thanks so much, Belldandy!
I am so glad!
I thought I would shadow them, but it looks like there is nothing to worry about.
Still, this is the last place anyone would call romantic.
Wow!
This is awesome!
Hey, it is my turn now!
Oh, sorry!
So this is what Megumi was talking about... a'romantic spot'!
All righty, I guess it is time for the third wheel to back out...
Want To go look at the stuff over there?
Yeah!
Want To go look at the stuff over there?
Oh my gosh, what can I do to distract those two?
I got it!
Oh, man!
I just touched it and the whole thing broke off!
Broke?
This is where you and I come in!
Hey!
You can just leave that to us!
It just so happens, we are from the NIT Auto Club...
Hey, it is the Seniors?
Whoops, I forgot, Kei's a member of the Auto Club too!
Uh... um...
This is a shrine to those of us in the Auto Club and you dare bring...
Unforgivable!
Now then, why do not you just come with us...
We must decline!
Belldandy?
I must spend the day alone with Keiichi today.
Huh?
Now then, shall we go, Keiichi?
Uh, sure...
What was that all about?
You do not think... she does not like us anymore?
Hey, she is tougher than I thought.
I guess there is no need for me to follow them anymore!
Good luck, now!
I wonder what is going on?
Hey, I really had a great time!
Now why do not we go someplace where you can enjoy yourself...
Oh, no!
That will not do!
I must see to it that you have a good time today!
Let us see...
Oh, I know!
Come on, let us go there!
Let us go where?
What is this place?
You can fix cars to your heart's content here!
Well, maybe I can, but...
It is not fun here?
No, of course it is fun!
I am sorry.
Such a variety of cars and motorcycles!
Uh-huh...
No good either?
Look at all these ancient cars!
I am so sorry!
No, do not be.
I mean, I hardly ever get the chance to come to a place like this!
Hey, look at this one, it is awesome.
So they used parts like these back in the old days, huh?
Listen, I really do appreciate all your concern for me, but...
You seem somewhat blue these days...
That is why I...
Because I want you to always have a smile on your face, Keiichi.
Gotcha!
In that case, there is a place I want to go.
Will you come with me?
It is just a ferry that is been around for ages.
But I like doing this... taking the last boat at sunset.
Is that so?
I would like to know what made you act the way you did today.
Um, you see, since I did not give you chocolate for Valentine's Day...
Is that the reason?
But you do not know the customs here on Earth.
You did not have to feel bad about it.
Please forgive me.
How can I call myself your goddess...
That is why you were trying so hard to show me a good time?
Yes...
But...
I am a failure as a goddess.
That is not true!
I had such a good time today!
But...
I am telling you the truth.
I mean, I had you by my side...
That is what makes me happy!
But I have to fulfill my job as a goddess...
All right, then, I want you to take me to a place that you like, Belldandy.
What?
I want to know what places you like, Belldandy.
To learn more about you... there is nothing I would enjoy more right now.
Keiichi...
It is right here.
This is my favorite place to be.
Where the wind crossing the vast ocean meets...
You can hear so many different voices right here.
It is such a lovely place.
This is it... this is a'romantic spot,' is not it?
Here.
Huh?
Forgive me for not giving it to you sooner...
Oh, hold on a minute!
Here!
It is for you, in return.
Keiichi...
Belldandy...
Keiichi!
Why does it always end up like this?
Just one more inch...
So you did give it to him!
Yes!
That is great!
Yes!
Caught a cold?
Uh, no...
There is something wrong after all.
Come to think of it...
The System Force has vanished, too.
Then does all this sneezing mean...
One day when I woke up...
A day like any other... another one just beginning.
There you are, yawning... your face is still so sleepy.
Because each peaceful day we share is a miracle to me.
This is where my heart will always return...
Forever...
There is only one thing I wish for.
I chase after the same dream, wherever it may go.
The love I feel for you gives me strength.
May tomorrow be as joyful as today...
That is my wish...
Blood ties... connections made by destiny.
A connection that is no different even if you happen to be goddesses.
Next episode: Ah! Can You Pass the Love Test With Those Low Scores?
Are goddesses allowed to wear white lab coats?
